Orson Welles directs and stars in this gritty tale of murder, corruption, and obsession, featuring an all-star cast including Charlton Heston, Marlene Dietrich, and Janet Leigh. It's a must-see for any fan of the genre!

This 2003 thriller stars Ben Affleck as an engineer who wakes up with no memory of who he is or what he's doing, only to discover that his paycheck has been pre-programmed with a huge sum - but at what cost? The movie's got all the twists and turns you'd expect from a classic film noir, and it's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
